text: 7|161|Arau smarana karaa, yetiya sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘tomaloke e'i janapadata basa karaa arau ya’ra paraa iccha khoraa lagate koraa, ‘hittatuna’ (ksama bicarao) arau natasirae duraaraerae praraesa karaiba; ami tomalokara aparaadhasamuha ksama karaima. Niscaya ami satkarmasilasakalaka adhika dana karaima’.
